content:
It sounds like you have a few hobbies and interests outside of photography! Organizing a stamp collection can be a fun and rewarding task, and it's great that you've been able to complete the 2019 commemorative stamp set. Philately is a fascinating hobby that requires patience, attention to detail, and a love for history and culture.

Stamp collecting and photography actually share some similarities. Both hobbies involve an appreciation for detail, an eye for composition, and a desire to preserve and showcase moments in time. Perhaps your experience with stamp collecting has even influenced your approach to photography, or vice versa!

Now, about that Olympus OM-1... I hope you're able to find a reliable repair shop to get it serviced soon. It's always exciting to get a vintage camera up and running again, and I'm sure you'll enjoy using it once it's restored to its former glory. Good luck with the repair process, and happy snapping (and stamp collecting!)!
